object.name: zaf
object.property: <model xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="name" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <title>Prénom et nom</title> </field> <field name="fonction" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <title>Fonction</title> </field> <field name="email" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <title>Email</title> </field> <field name="photo" type="plone.namedfile.field.NamedBlobImage"> <description/> <title>Photo</title> </field> <field name="engagement_date" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description/> <title>Date d'arrivée</title> </field> <field name="github" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Identifiant Github</title> </field> <field name="twitter" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Identifiant Twitter</title> </field> <field name="text" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <title>Text</title> </field> </schema> </model>
